entry.def: A pressing problem, need, or issue has to be dealt with immediately.

example.ex: It is one of the most pressing problems facing this country...
example.tran: 这是该国面临的最紧迫的问题之一。

example.ex: There is a pressing need for more funds.

means.word_mean: 1. the act of pressing; the exertion of pressure;

sentences.sentence: "he used pressure to stop the bleeding"

means.word_mean: 2. a metal or plastic part that is made by a mechanical press

sentences.sentence: "too pressing to permit of longer delay"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可压缩的, 可压榨的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compress[v.压缩]+ible能……的→adj.可压缩的, 可压榨的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
stems_affixes.word_buile: depress[v.压制,压抑]+ed……的→adj.沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给人深刻印象的,感人的
stems_affixes.word_buile: impress印象,引人注目+ive……的→adj.给人深刻印象的,感人的
press挤压+ing……的→adj.急迫的
compress[v.压缩]+ion表名词→n.压缩,压紧,浓缩
depress[v.压制,压抑]+ion表名词→n.消沉;不景气萧条期
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
stems_affixes.word_buile: express表达,表示+ion→n.表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
impress印象,引人注目+ion表名词→n.印象,感想;盖印,压痕
oppress[v.压迫,压制]+ion表名词→n.压迫

stems_affixes.value_cn: 压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
stems_affixes.word_buile: press挤压+ure表名词→n.压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
suppress[v.镇压,压制]+ion表名词→n.镇压,压制
press挤压→n.&n.&v.压, 按
com一起+press压→一起压→压缩
de向下+press压→向下压→压制→情绪低下
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达
im进+press挤压→压进去→盖印→印入头脑→留下印象
op加强动作+press挤压→拼命压→压迫
re回+press挤压→压回去
sup下+press压→压下去

Sentence.sentence: The perpetual argument is that funds are tight, that we have more pressing problems here on Earth.

sentences.en: Pressing business matters prevented him from taking a holiday.
sentences.cn: 他因商务上有紧迫事情而不能去度假。
